CustomField.description: This field displays all the sections in order separated by a semicolon. For example, the text “General;Extra“ would display the “General“ section first and an “Extra“ section second. (PVFSL-603)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field displays all the sections in order separated by a semicolon. For example, the text “General;Extra“ would display the “General“ section first and an “Extra“ section second.
CustomField.label: Section Order
